Class ClientSocketService

java.lang.Object
com.inFlight.client.socket.ClientSocketService
public class ClientSocketService extends Object
ClientSocketService is a service class that handles communication with the server using sockets. It provides methods to send requests and receive responses from the server.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public boolean connect()
      connect method establishes a connection to the server. It creates a socket and initializes input/output streams for communication.

    • send

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject send(String action, com.google.gson.JsonObject data)
      send method sends a request to the server and receives a response. It serializes the request data to JSON format and deserializes the response data from JSON format.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be performed
      data - The data associated with the action
      Returns:
      The response from the server as a JsonObject

    • updateNovaCredits

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject updateNovaCredits(int passengerId, int amount)
      updateNovaCredits method updates the Nova credits for a passenger.
      Parameters:
      passengerId - The ID of the passenger
      amount - The amount to update
      Returns:
      The response from the server as a JsonObject

    • sendChatMessage

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject sendChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
      sendChatMessage method sends a chat message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message -
      Returns:
      The response from the server as a JsonObject

    • getChat

      public List<ChatMessage> getChat(String sender, String receiver)
      getChat method retrieves the chat messages between two users.
      Parameters:
      sender - The sender's username
      receiver - The receiver's username
      Returns:
      A list of chat messages

    • getAvailableSlots

      public List<SpacewalkSlot> getAvailableSlots()
      getAvailableSlots method retrieves the available spacewalk slots from the server.
      Returns:
      A list of available spacewalk slots

    • sendBooking

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject sendBooking(int passengerId, int slotId, int tier)
      sendBooking method sends a booking request for a spacewalk slot.
      Parameters:
      passengerId - The ID of the passenger
      slotId - The ID of the spacewalk slot
      tier - The tier of the booking
      Returns:
      The response from the server as a JsonObject

      Parameters:
      passengerId - The ID of the passenger
      Returns:
      A list of bookings for the passenger

      Returns:
      The SpacewalkSlot object if found, null otherwise

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      isConnected method checks if the client is connected to the server.
      Returns:
      true if connected, false otherwise

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      disconnect method closes the socket connection to the server. It is important to call this method when the client is done using the service.
